name: PB_DTL_TX
description: The PB_DTL_TX table contains the coverage-level detailed transactions associated with a premium billing account transaction.

columns.name: PB_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing detailed transaction.

columns.name: PDX_TX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the type of the transaction (i.e. premium billing, payment, etc.)

columns.name: PDX_TX_SENSE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the transaction is a credit or debit.

columns.name: TX_DATE
columns.description: Date that the transaction was created in the system.

columns.name: EFF_DATE
columns.description: Effective date of the transaction. This date represents the first day of the coverage period being billed for the transaction.

columns.name: REAL_DATE
columns.description: Realization date of the transaction. This date represents the cycle date of the premium billing batch that computed this transaction.

columns.name: PB_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing account associated with the detailed transaction.

columns.name: AMT
columns.description: Amount of the transaction.

columns.name: PB_ACT_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing account transaction to which the detailed transaction is associated.

columns.name: ACCT_POST_DATE
columns.description: Account posting date of the detailed transaction. This date represents the day that the detailed transaction was posted to the premium billing account.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the coverage record.

columns.name: BENEFIT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the benefit plan.

columns.name: BENEFIT_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: RIDER_BEN_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the rider associated with the detailed transaction.

columns.name: RIDER_BEN_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: SUB_PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient associated with the detailed transaction.

columns.name: NUM_MEMS
columns.description: Number of members on the coverage associated with the detailed transaction.

columns.name: CVG_ATTR_C_NAME
columns.description: Coverage attributes associated with the detailed transaction.

columns.name: PRORATE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether premium is being pro-rated for the detailed transaction.

columns.name: PDX_PRORATE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the method used for pro-rating premium.

columns.name: CVG_RATE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether coverage rates are being used on the detailed transaction.

columns.name: RETRO_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether this detailed transaction is a retroactive premium adjustments.

columns.name: RET_RVSL_PB_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of detailed transaction that reversed this detailed transaction.

columns.name: RET_ADJ_PB_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the adjustment detailed transaction if the detailed transaction has been reversed and adjusted.

columns.name: RET_ORIG_PB_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the original detailed transaction if the detailed transaction is an adjustment.

columns.name: CANCELS_PB_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of detailed transaction which this detailed transaction voids out.

columns.name: OUTSTAND_AMT
columns.description: Outstanding amount for the detailed transaction.

columns.name: INIT_PB_INVC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of initial invoice on which the detailed transaction is included.

columns.name: ORG_OVPST_PB_TX_ID
columns.description: If this detail transaction is an overpost originating from the overpayment of an existing detail transaction, then this field stores the The unique ID of the original detail transaction.

columns.name: PDX_CLOSE_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the reason the detailed transaction was closed (paid in full or balance forward).

columns.name: CHNG_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the type of change associated with the detailed transaction (add, delete, or change tiers).

columns.name: NUMBER_OF_ADULT
columns.description: For income level billing, this field stores the number of additional adult dependents

columns.name: NUMBER_OF_CHILD
columns.description: For income level billing, this field stores the number of child dependents

columns.name: NUMBER_OF_LTJOINER
columns.description: For income level billing, this field stores the number of members identified as late joiners.

columns.name: PREM_SAVINGS
columns.description: Amount of this detailed transaction that is considered savings premium.

columns.name: REVCLOSED_PB_TX_ID
columns.description: When using a previously closed type of exception in payment posting, this field stores the unique ID of the detailed transaction that this transaction reverses.

columns.name: CLSDREVBY_PB_TX_ID
columns.description: When using a previously closed type of exception in payment posting, this field stores the unique ID of the detailed transaction that reversed this transaction.

columns.name: PAIDBY_PB_TXSET_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the transaction set that was last used to post a payment against this transaction.

columns.name: SAVINGS_PDX_YN
columns.description: Whether savings premium is included in this detailed transaction.

columns.name: OLD_CVG_ATTR_C_NAME
columns.description: Old coverage attributes associated with the detailed transaction.

columns.name: OLD_PDX_AMOUNT
columns.description: Old  amount associated with the detailed transaction.

columns.name: LEP_YN
columns.description: This flag indicates if a PDX represent a Medicare Part D Late Enrollment Penalty.

columns.name: AR_TX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of transaction. This indicates if the transaction is a charge, a payment, or an adjustment.

columns.name: AR_TX_CODE_PROC_ID
columns.description: The code associated with a transaction. The code is used as a more discrete category for the transaction. For example, an adjustment transaction may use a different code to differentiate between a write-off adjustment and a balance transfer adjustment.

columns.name: AR_TX_AMOUNT
columns.description: The dollar amount for a transaction.

columns.name: AR_TX_ACCT_PB_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The account that this transaction is posting to.

columns.name: AR_TX_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The coverage that this transaction applies to.

columns.name: AR_TX_EFF_DATE
columns.description: The effective date that this transaction applies to.

columns.name: AR_TX_MEMBER_PAT_ID
columns.description: The member that this transaction applies to. This applies only to per-member accounts.

columns.name: AR_TX_SUBSCRIBER_PAT_ID
columns.description: The subscriber that this transaction applies to.

columns.name: AR_TX_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The current status for a transaction.

columns.name: AR_TX_FILED_DATE
columns.description: The date that a transaction has filed to the system.

columns.name: AR_TX_REVERSED_TRANSACTION_ID
columns.description: The transaction ID that is being reversed by a given transaction.

columns.name: AR_TX_CORRECTED_TRANSACTION_ID
columns.description: The transaction ID that is being corrected by a given transaction.
